<h3 id="X37579">X(37579)&nbsp;=&nbsp; X(1)X(3)&cap;X(24)X(108)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*(a + b - c)*(a - b + c)*(a^3 - a^2*b - a*b^2 + b^3 - a^2*c - 2*a*b*c + b^2*c - a*c^2 + b*c^2 + c^3) : :
<br>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; a (sin 2A cot A/2 - sin 2B cot B/2 - sin 2C cot C/2) : :
<p>
Let H<sub>A</sub>H<sub>B</sub>H<sub>C</sub> be the orthic triangle and JaJbJc be the excentral triangle.  Let A' be the orthogonal projection of Ja on line H<sub>B</sub>H<sub>C</sub>, and define B' and C' cyclically.  The lines AA', BB', CC' concur in X(37579).  (Randy Hutson, March 29, 2020)
</p>
<p>
